scripts.build:all: npm run build -w 3d && node scripts/sync-3d-to-web-static.mjs && npm run build -w web
scripts.build:web: node scripts/sync-3d-to-web-static.mjs && npm run build -w web
scripts.start:all: npm run build:all && npm run serve:web
scripts.start:web: npm run build:web && npm run serve:web
scripts.start:3d: npm run build:3d && npm run serve:web
scripts.dev:web: node scripts/sync-3d-to-web-static.mjs && npm run dev -w web -- --port 5174 --strictPort
scripts.dev:3d: concurrently -n webBuilt,3dDev -c yellow,magenta "npm run serve:web:3ddev" "npm run dev -w 3d"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n webDev,3dDev -c blue,magenta "cross-env THREED_BUNDLE_URL=http://localhost:5173/src/bundle.ts npm run dev:web" "npm run dev -w 3d"
